about_the_game:
Use 5 Unique Weapons and Destroy Every Wave!

Collect Coins and Upgrade Your Weapons and Stats!

Defeat Special Enemies and Improve Your Skills!

In this demo version of Viking Survivors: The Last Ragnarök, you'll face the gods' wrath as a fearless Viking, battling against endless waves of mythical beasts. The demo offers a taste of the full action roguelite experience, with a limited but thrilling selection of content:

  • 1 playable character to master and survive with.

  • 5 powerful weapons to discover and wield against your enemies.

  • 1 challenging boss fight to test your skills and strategy.

  • 1 immersive map, where you’ll face waves of mythical foes and attempt to survive the storm.

This is just a glimpse of what's to come in the full game, which includes many more characters, weapons, maps, and bosses. Will you carve your legend in this demo, or fall to the gods' wrath? The choice is yours!

In "Viking Survivors," the gods' wrath has unleashed hell on Earth. As a fearless Viking, you must fight through endless waves of mythical beasts in this intense action roguelite. There’s no refuge, no escape—only survival. Gather treasures and powerful relics to prepare for the inevitable, all while carving your legend in the heart of this Norse bullet hell. Can you defy fate and survive the storm?

name: Viking Survivors: The Last Ragnarök Demo
short_description: Viking Survivors is an action roguelite where you wield ancient weapons and unleash Norse fury on endless waves of monsters. Survive the bullet hell, collect mythic weapons, and prove you're the ultimate Viking warrior in this thrilling survival game.
